name: What's So Cool About Divine Fire?
name_original: What's So Cool About Divine Fire?
description:
What's So Cool About Divine Fire? is a hack of Jared Sinclair's What's So Cool About Outer Space?   for 2-4 players.

One player will be the DEMIURGE(GM). The rest will take on the role of desperate SEEKERS.

Track and steal lore from people who can't appreciate it. Barter with entities beyond your reckoning. Fleece rubes to fund your lifestyle. Wrestle the Starry Bull to the ground. Or ascend to new heights of power, profane or divine.

Who's going to stop you?

This game uses six-sided dice.

I only have a placeholder present. Just wanted to stake the name.
